code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Register=()=>{const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[errorMessage,setErrorMessage]=useState('');const[successMessage,setSuccessMessage]=useState('');const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{await axios.post('https://cododojo-backend.onrender.com/register',{username,email,password});setSuccessMessage('User registered successfully!');setErrorMessage('');}catch(err){setErrorMessage('Registration failed.
